text: David Selman (1878 – August 1, 1937) was an American film director.Langman & Finn p.86 ==Selected filmography== * South Sea Love (1923) * Kentucky Days (1923) * Remember (1926) * Resurrection (1931) * The Westerner (1934) * Fighting Shadows (1935) * Gallant Defender (1935) * Justice of the Range (1935) * The Revenge Rider (1935) * Riding Wild (1935) * Square Shooter (1935) * Secret Patrol (1936) * The Mysterious Avenger (1936) * Tugboat Princess (1936) * The Cowboy Star (1936) * Woman Against the World (1937) * Find the Witness (1937) * Texas Trail (1937) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Larry Langman & Daniel Finn. A Guide to American Crime Films of the Thirties. Greenwood Press, 1995. ==External links== * Category:1878 births Category:1937 deaths Category:American film directors Category:Place of birth missing Category:Death in California
title: David Selman
